policies.name: cfs_latency
policies.description: Reduce CFS latency to favor short interactive workloads.
policies.intent: Improve responsiveness for bursty foreground tasks.

policies.name: nice_boost
policies.description: Run jobs with elevated CPU priority using nice -5.
policies.intent: Lower latency for mission-critical tasks without kernel modules.

policies.name: cpu_quota
policies.description: Throttle jobs with a 200% CPU quota using cgroup v2.
policies.intent: Prevent batch workloads from starving latency-sensitive jobs.
